hero.paragraphline1: Our mission is to help you invest intelligently,

stats.moreProfit: More profit on average for every adhering business.
stats.lessRisk: Less risk compared to traditional investment methods.

map.description: Tunisia is a North African nation with 24 cities and a rich agricultural sector.

about.investmentText: Indigenes is an investment platform that helps investors find and reach out to projects across Tunisia, so you can invest with ease and support the noble cause of aiding African development at the same time.
about.technologyText: We want to be as straightforward and transparent as possible, so our fees and rates are clearly stated upfront, we never charge any hidden fees or commissions. You don't need to worry about anything but investing.

about3.helpText: We are a platform that does all the heavy lifting for you. With just a few taps, you can invest in projects all around Tunisia by reaching out to them and provide insights or ask pre-sales questions through our chat function.

features4.heading: Everything your project needs and more

featuresCardsTitle: Everything your project needs and more

featurescards.heading: Investments
featurescards.content: Get access to the entirety of the Tunisian investment community and find your match.

featurescards.heading: Analysis
featurescards.content: Our team of curated experts will help in perfecting every aspect of your project study.

featurescards.heading: Statistics
featurescards.content: Follow your project in real-time with our advanced statistics and information system.

vision.text: Our vision here at Indignes is to help people invest in the future of Tunisia, because we will all benefit from it and feel the impact it will hopefully do for the next generations of Tunisian youth.
vision.author: Rayen Fassatoui

about2.header: What does it mean to be part of CIN group™ ?
about2.descriptionline1: Reaching out to a project is simple and can be done in just a fewminutes !
about2.descriptionline2: Plus, we help you make more money by reducing risk using analysis ofprojects and guidance from our specialized unit.
about2.cardheader: Success is best when it's shared.
